instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00840 power plug works  one way not other
threads.message: on port for U3200 a/c adapter works one direction when flip over it does not i tried different cables with usb volt meter it goes to 5v then 19.5v then shuts down

threads.title: 820-00840 power plug works  one way not other
threads.message:
Clean connector terminals.
Compare diode mode readings on terminals between both ports.

threads.title: 820-00840 power plug works  one way not other
threads.message: they are the same on both sides

threads.title: 820-00840 power plug works  one way not other
threads.message: Compare diode mode readings on CC1/2 lines between both channels.
